entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is being attacked by the dog. ("Harry reached for his wand...", "he keeled over backward in a whirl of hair...")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who tries to protect him from the dog. ("Ron was on his feet.", "the dog’s jaws fastened instead around Ron’s outstretched arm.")

entities.name: dog
entities.description: A gigantic, pale-eyed, jet-black dog that is attacking Harry and Ron. ("an enormous, pale-eyed, jet-black dog.", "the force of its leap had carried it too far...")

relationships.description: The dog is attacking Harry. ("Something was bounding toward them, quiet as a shadow — an enormous, pale-eyed, jet-black dog.")
The dog is also attacking Ron. ("the dog’s jaws fastened instead around Ron’s outstretched arm.")
Ron tries to protect Harry from the dog. ("Ron was on his feet.", "he pushed Harry aside...")
